channel.title: scene on 蛋挞
channel.description: Recent content in scene on 蛋挞

item.title: 使用hugo在Github上自动部署博客
item.description: 本文概要： hugo安装和部署 GitHub的repository创建 GitHub的action创建 0x00 Linux(ubuntu)下hugo的下载和安装 使用apt进行二进制安装 $ sudo apt-get hugo 0x01 使用hugo生成站点 使用Hugo快速生成站点 $ hugo new site <your project filename> 举例子：比如希望生成到 /myweb/tart 路径文件夹： $ hugo new site /myweb/tart 0x02 创建文章 方法1 使用hugo命令创建： $ hugo new about.md about.md自动生成到了 content/about.md，打开 about.md看下： --- date = "2015-10-25T08:36:54-07:00" draft = true title = "about" --- 正文内容 0x04 安装主题 到！主题 挑选一个心仪的皮肤，比如你觉得 Hyde 皮肤不错，找到相关的 GitHub 地址，创建目录 themes，在 themes 目录里把皮肤 git clone 下来： # 创建 themes 目录 $ cd quickstart $ git init $ git submodule add https://github.

item.title: Chapter IV: Master Jacques Coppenole
item.description: While the pensioner of Ghent and his eminence were exchanging very low bows and a few words in voices still lower, a man of lofty stature, with a large face and broad shoulders, presented himself, in order to enter abreast with Guillaume Rym; one would have pronounced him a bull-dog by the side of a fox. His felt doublet and leather jerkin made a spot on the velvet and silk which surrounded him.

item.title: Chapter I: The Grand Hall
item.description: Three hundred and forty-eight years, six months, and nineteen days ago to-day, the Parisians awoke to the sound of all the bells in the triple circuit of the city, the university, and the town ringing a full peal. The sixth of January, 1482, is not, however, a day of which history has preserved the memory. There was nothing notable in the event which thus set the bells and the bourgeois of Paris in a ferment from early morning.

item.title: 碎碎念
item.description: awaw Three hundred and forty-eight years, six months, and nineteen days ago to-day, the Parisians awoke to the sound of all the bells in the triple circuit of the city, the university, and the town ringing a full peal. The sixth of January, 1482, is not, however, a day of which history has preserved the memory. There was nothing notable in the event which thus set the bells and the bourgeois of Paris in a ferment from early morning.
